T02TD1277E:123b-21: dkyil 'khor nyid du ni de bzhin 'dod //
T02TD1277E:123b-22: de'i phyir 'phral du sa bcu'i dbang phyug bden pa gnyis gcig pa'i ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sa bdud 'joms pa zhes so //
T02TD1277E:123b-23: bsgom pa gzhan gyis kyang rnal 'byor ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel ba'i ched dang /
T02TD1277E:123b-24: bgegs nye bar zhi ba'i don du yang ji ltar rnyed pa'i phyir mchod pas bcom ldan 'das mchod par bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1277E:124a-1: pa'i cho ga brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:124a-2: kye rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags pas tho rangs kyi dus su gnas ji lta bar phyag dar la sogs pa bya ste /
T02TD1277E:124a-3: sa'i cha shas rnams la lag pa reg ste /
T02TD1277E:124a-4: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-5: zhes pas sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02TD1277E:124a-6: der bdud rtsi lnga dang dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs te /
T02TD1277E:124a-7: de dang de'i sa gzhir mos pas /
T02TD1277E:124a-10: 'dun pa dang nye ba'i 'dun pa dang /
T02TD1277E:124a-11: 'du ba dang nye ba'i 'du ba dang /
T02TD1277E:124a-15: nye ba'i dur khrod ces brjod de /
T02TD1277E:124a-16: mandala gru bzhi pa byas nas /
T02TD1277E:124a-17: aom badzra re khe h'um zhes pas khor yug byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD1277E:124a-18: aom su re khe sarba ta th'a ga ta aa dhi tishtha ntu sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-19: zhes pas mandala gyi dbus su me tog gcig gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124a-20: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02TD1277E:124a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum kun du bskyod pa dpa' bo lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba spyan drangs te /
T02TD1277E:124a-22: de la mtshungs pa med pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du phul te /
T02TD1277E:124a-23: h'um yig las skyes shing yi ge gsum gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pa /
T02TD1277E:124a-24: aom a'a: h'um he badzra ya badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-25: zhes pas dang por bcom ldan 'das la me tog gcig dbul lo //
T02TD1277E:124a-26: phyi nas snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dag gis so //
T02TD1277E:124a-27: aom a'a: nee ra a'atma ye badzra pushpe aam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-28: zhes pas mchod pa byas nas aom aam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-29: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u /
T02TD1277E:124a-34: zhes pa'i sngags dag gis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124a-35: gnyis ka'i spyi bor aom a'a:/
T02TD1277E:124a-36: aaksho bhya ya badzra pushpe h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-37: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su /
T02TD1277E:124a-38: aom a'a: goo ra+ye badzra pushpe gam h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-39: aom goo r'i h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124a-40: 'di dag gis goo r'i mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124a-41: de ltar yi ge gsum gyis rang rang gi sa bon gyi yi ge dang rnam par spel ba'i tsoo r'i la sogs pa lhag par mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:124b-0: phyi nas aom yig dang lhan cig bod pa'i tshig gis phul nas h'um h'um h'um phat kyi yi ge dang sv'a h'a'i mtha' @124b can gyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124b-1: de ltar pushpe'i gnas su dh'u pe la sogs rnams kyis so so'i ming bcug ste dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1277E:124b-2: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta su la li ta /
T02TD1277E:124b-3: na mi tee re na m'a mi /
T02TD1277E:124b-5: shr'i he ru ka n'a tham dza: h'um bam ho: pra t'i tstsha mam /
T02TD1277E:124b-6: ku su ma aanydza li n'a th'a: ho zhes pas me tog snyim pas phul nas 'dud par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124b-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza me gha pra sa ra sa mu he spha ra h'i mam ga ga na kham h'um sa manta sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:124b-8: mchod pa byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1277E:124b-10: bdud kyi sgyu ma rab 'joms shing //
T02TD1277E:124b-11: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa //
T02TD1277E:124b-12: rnam par 'phrul pa'i rang bzhin sku //
T02TD1277E:124b-13: kye yi rdo rje khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1277E:124b-14: ces pas phyag byas nas ji ltar nus pa'i sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD1277E:124b-15: rigs su skye dang dam tshig can //
T02TD1277E:124b-16: smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston //
T02TD1277E:124b-17: bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan //
T02TD1277E:124b-18: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog / lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02TD1277E:124b-19: zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang //
T02TD1277E:124b-20: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas ni //
T02TD1277E:124b-21: skye zhing skye bar 'gyur ba shog / smon lam byas nas /
T02TD1277E:124b-22: de nas cho ga lhag chad kha bskang ba'i don du yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02TD1277E:124b-23: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
T02TD1277E:124b-24: badzra sa tva tve no pa tishtha /
T02TD1277E:124b-27: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD1277E:124b-28: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1277E:124b-31: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho /
T02TD1277E:124b-32: bha ga b'an sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02TD1277E:124b-34: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad /
T02TD1277E:124b-35: 'di ltar rjes mthun dngos grub stsol //
T02TD1277E:124b-36: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02TD1277E:124b-37: slar yang byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1277E:124b-38: aom badzra mu: zhes gshegs su gsol /
T02TD1277E:124b-39: de ltar phyag bzhi pa dang /
T02TD1277E:124b-41: phyag bcu drug pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang mtshungs par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:124b-42: dang por yi ge gsum gyis mchod par byas nas rang rang gi sngags kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:124b-43: rdo rje phag mo la'ang bdag med ma yis dbul lo //
T02TD1277E:125a-0: phyag bcu drug pa la ni rkang pa brgyad pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis kyang mchod par bya @125a * //
T02TD1277E:125a-2: aom aashn'a na n'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-3: aom pidho rdhva ke sha partma ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-4: aom tsa tu rbidsha ti ne tra ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-5: aom sho da sha bhu dz'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-6: aom krishna dz'i m'u ta ba pu she h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-7: aom ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-8: aom a'adhm'a ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-9: aom aardhe ndu dam shtr'i ne h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:125a-10: zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod par byas nas smon lam la sogs pa sngar bzhin byas te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:125a-11: de nas kha zas kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:125a-12: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dang bor bza' ba dang thug pa la sogs pa la /
T02TD1277E:125a-13: cho ga bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i chang g-yon pa'i srin mdzub kyis gtor zhing /
T02TD1277E:125a-14: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi dbus su snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs pa'am /
T02TD1277E:125a-15: snying ga'i sa bon las 'phros pa yang rung ste /
T02TD1277E:125a-16: sngar brjod pa'i sngags rnams la zas kyi dngos po'i ming spel ba rnams kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:125a-17: phyi nas gshegs su gsol la dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyis kha cung zad dag par byas te /
T02TD1277E:125a-18: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho ga'i rnam pas gtor ma phul nas /
T02TD1277E:125a-19: lte ba'i thab khung gi mes reg pas kha zas rnams zhu zhing babs nas /
T02TD1277E:125a-20: snying gar gnas pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' 'am /
T02TD1277E:125a-21: lte ba'i padma'i ze 'bru la gnas pa'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba can gyi aam yig la thim pas tshim par bya'o zhes pa phyi'i dngos po rnams kyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1277E:125a-22: de nas mthar aom autstshishta badzra aa dhi tishtha ai mam ba lim /
T02TD1277E:125a-23: grihna grihna h'um h'um h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:125a-24: ces pas lhag ma'i gtor ma byin nas zas dor bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:125a-25: phyi'i dngos po la ltos pa med pa'i slar yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni /
T02TD1277E:125a-26: sngar bzhin rlung gis sbar te /
T02TD1277E:125a-27: rtog pa mtha' dag gi mun pa dang sgrib par byed pa rnams /
T02TD1277E:125a-28: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thab tu shin tu gtum pa'i gtum mos bsregs shing /
T02TD1277E:125a-29: byang chub kyi sems kyi zas kyi sbyin sreg gis sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD1277E:125b-0: shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag @125b nyid dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-1: nyi ma dang zla ba ro mnyam par gyur pa shin tu 'bar bas gang bar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1277E:125b-3: 'jig rten pa'i mngon par mtho ba'i sar gyur pa bla na med pa'i sbyin sreg ste /
T02TD1277E:125b-4: skad cig so sor goms pas 'thob bo //
T02TD1277E:125b-5: da ni gtor ma brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:125b-6: dri dang me tog la sogs pa g-yas su dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-7: mdun du sha ka ta dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-8: bha ra la sogs pa'i snod du nya sha dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-9: dzambu di ka la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-11: chu khyor ba gsum dang ldan par bya zhing /
T02TD1277E:125b-12: ji ltar rnyed pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas rnams kyang ldan par byas te bzhag la /
T02TD1277E:125b-14: bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga'i rim pas bdud rtsir byas te /
T02TD1277E:125b-15: de kho na nyid gsum gyi chos kyi 'byung gnas dkar po dmar po nag po gsum gyi khung bur gnas pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa can steng nas steng du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:125b-16: de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i goo r'i /
T02TD1277E:125b-17: aom goo r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa ri b'a r'a na a'a karsha ya dza: zhes pas bkug / aom tsoo r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa ri wa' r'a na pra be sha ya h'um zhes tsoo r'i sa padma rnams su bcug / aom be t'a l'i aindra aa d'i na sa pa ri b'a r'a na bandha ya bam zhes be t'a l'i spros pas bcing bas bcings /
T02TD1277E:125b-18: aom ghasma r'i aindra a'a d'i na sa pa ri b'a r'an pra be sha ya ho: zhes pas dbang du byas te /
T02TD1277E:125b-19: de la chos kyi 'byung gnas dbus ma la gnas pa'i padma'i 'dab ma la /
T02TD1277E:125b-21: mig stong ldan pa dkar po rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa glang po che sa srung gi pu dkar po la zhon pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-22: lho'i 'dab ma la gshin rje nag po /
T02TD1277E:125b-23: dbyug pa dang sdigs mdzub can gyi phyag gnyis pa ma he la zhon pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-24: nub kyi 'dab mar chu lha dkar po chu srin la zhon pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-25: sbrul gyi gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-27: byang gi 'dab ma la lus ngan ser po lus rags pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-28: gter la gnas pa b'i dza p'u ra dang /
T02TD1277E:125b-30: de rnams thams cad rin po che'i rgyan dang rin po che'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:125b-31: gshin rje nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can no //
T02TD1277E:126a-0: dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar dbang phyug @126a * //
T02TD1277E:126a-3: ral pa'i cod pan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-4: rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag rgya can /
T02TD1277E:126a-5: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02TD1277E:126a-7: goo r'i la mnyam par 'khyud pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-8: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02TD1277E:126a-9: me'i 'dab mar me lha shin tu dmar ba lto ba 'phyang ba /
T02TD1277E:126a-11: smin ma dang ral pa dmar ser can /
T02TD1277E:126a-12: bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag can /
T02TD1277E:126a-13: nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02TD1277E:126a-14: bden bral gyi 'dab mar srin po'i bdag po sngon po ro la zhon pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-15: skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-16: smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-17: gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-18: ral gri dang phub 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1277E:126a-19: bden bral gyi 'dab mar rlung lha sngon po rlung yab 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-21: rin po che'i cod pan can /
T02TD1277E:126a-22: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-24: ze 'bru la sa'i lha mo ser mo rin po che'i gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-26: g-yas pas dam bcas pa sngon du nye bar 'gro ba'i phyag can zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can yi dgas dang mun pa can gyis bskor te gnas pa'o //
T02TD1277E:126a-27: steng du gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar /
T02TD1277E:126a-28: zla ba dkar po rta dkar po dang ldan pa'i ku mu ta'i shing rta la gnas pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-29: phyag gnyis kyis zla bas mtshan pa'i ku mu ta 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-30: zla ba'i gdan dang 'od can no //
T02TD1277E:126a-31: lhor nyi ma nyi mas mtshan pa'i padma 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-32: rta ljang gu'i shing rta la gnas pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-33: rang gi gdan dang 'od can no //
T02TD1277E:126a-34: nub la sogs pa dang dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams su rim pas sa skyes dmar po ra la zhon pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-36: g-yas na chu gri dang g-yon pas mi mgo za ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1277E:126a-37: lhag pa ljang gu mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126a-39: pur bu ser po bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa ste /
T02TD1277E:126a-40: rin po che'i pa tra dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1277E:126b-0: pa sangs dkar @126b po bgrang phreng dang ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-2: spen pa nag po bgrang phreng dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-4: sgra gcan dmar nag shing rta la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdan can /
T02TD1277E:126b-5: skra dang sma ra dmar ser 'bar ba rnam par 'joms pa'i mche ba bzhi pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-6: nyi ma dang zla ba'i phyag can no //
T02TD1277E:126b-7: der de bzhin du tog dud ka / ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-9: ka ka ti tra 'dzin pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1277E:126b-10: ze 'bru la tshangs pa ser po zhal bzhi rgyas pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-11: phyag bzhi pa g-yas pa'i phyag gis bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-12: gzhan gyis mi 'jigs pa'i tshul can /
T02TD1277E:126b-13: g-yon gyis dbyu gu gsum pa dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-15: ngang pa la zhon pa ral pa can mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa /
T02TD1277E:126b-16: tshangs pas yongs su bskor ba mtshe ma dang dga' ldan pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-18: tshangs pa mdun na 'don la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-19: lha thams cad gnas par blta'o //
T02TD1277E:126b-20: chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og ma la gnas pa'i padma'i shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams su rim pas stobs kyi rgyu dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-22: mtha' yas dang nor rgyas rnams ljang gu dang ser po dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-23: sngon po dang dkar po rnams so //
T02TD1277E:126b-24: dbang ldan la sogs pa'i phyogs bral gyi 'dab ma rnams su 'jog po dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-33: rigs ldan ser po'o zhes kha cig go //
T02TD1277E:126b-34: de rnams gdengs ka bdun dang ldan pa ze 'bru la lhag ma can dkar po de rnams thams cad kyi lus phyed mi la rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD1277E:126b-35: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lhag ma can bskor te gnas pa go cha dang bcas shing ral gri 'dzin pa'i lha ma yin dang dmyal ba pa'i sems can blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:126b-36: dbus dang steng dang 'og gi padma la gnas pa rnams rang rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te /
T02TD1277E:127a-1: gsung gi rang bzhin h'um aom a'a:'i yi ge las skyes pa rnams nag po dkar po dmar po'i mdog can zhal gcig pa /
T02TD1277E:127a-2: phyag gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02TD1277E:127a-3: rang bzhin gyi rig ma la 'khyud pa /
T02TD1277E:127a-4: g-yas brkyang gi stan la gnas pa rnams la /
T02TD1277E:127a-5: he ru ka'i gzugs kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur te /
T02TD1277E:127a-6: mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02TD1277E:127a-7: 'od dpag tu med pa rnams kyis rgyas btab par blta bar byas nas /
T02TD1277E:127a-8: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mig la sogs pa rnams su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD1277E:127a-9: de nas bar ma chad par aom pra ba ra satk'a ra aargham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:127a-10: zhes pa'i sngags kyis dung chos kyi phyag rgyas mdun du de rnams la mchod yon phul nas /
T02TD1277E:127a-11: dung chos kyi phyag rgyas zhabs dag la zhabs bsil dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1277E:127a-27: sgeg pa dang bcas shing dril bu'i sgra byas la /
T02TD1277E:127a-28: sngar bzhin bdud rtsir byas pa'i gtor ma'i zas rnams bdag nyid kyi lce rdo rje'i sbyor bas zos shing bza' bar bya ste /
T02TD1277E:127a-29: de rnams kyang de bzhin kho nar de myong bar byed pa'o zhes bsams te /
T02TD1277E:127a-44: zhes pas zhal zas su byas nas dril bu gnas gsum rnams su dkrol bar byas te /
T02TD1277E:127a-45: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:127a-46: zhes pa 'dis tshim par byas nas /
T02TD1277E:127a-48: ko lal ai re njee ai bo l'a /
T02TD1277E:127a-49: mu mmu ni re kakko l'a /
T02TD1277E:127a-50: gha ne kri pi ta ho b'a dzdza ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-51: k'a ru ne ki aa ai na ro l'a /
T02TD1277E:127a-52: ta him ba la kha dzdza ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-53: ge dham ma aa n'a pi dzdza ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-54: ha le k'a linydza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-55: dun du ra b'a dzdzi aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-56: tsa au sa ma katstshu r'i sihla /
T02TD1277E:127a-57: k'a ppu ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-58: ma la aindha na sa linydza /
T02TD1277E:127a-59: ta him bha ru kha ai aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-60: phrem kha na kha ta ka ra nte /
T02TD1277E:127a-61: shu ddh aa shu ddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-62: ni ram shu aangge tsa d'a bi /
T02TD1277E:127a-63: ta him dza sa r'a ba pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-64: ma la aa dze kun du ru p'a ta ai /
T02TD1277E:127a-65: din di ma ta him na badzdza aa ai /
T02TD1277E:127b-0: phyi nas bsang @127b gtor phul nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD1277E:127b-1: aom a'a: badzra pu sh'e h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:127b-2: zhes pa 'di nyid dang dh'u pa la sogs pas phul nas rang gis bye brag ma phyed pa dang /
T02TD1277E:127b-3: cho ga dman dang lhag pa sbyong ba'i don du sngon bzhin yi ge brgya pa bklag sa nas gshegs su gsol lo zhes so //
T02TD1277E:127b-4: rim pa'i bar ma chad par yang gtor ma brjod de /
T02TD1277E:127b-5: kye rdo rje'i gzugs kyi thugs ka'i h'um yig gi 'od zer gyis /
T02TD1277E:127b-6: khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'i srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar gnas pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang du gzhal yas khang rgya che ba la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1277E:127b-7: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyogs la sogs pa rnams su dbang po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dang sems can dpag tu med pa bkug pa rnams 'od gsal du bcug nas /
T02TD1277E:127b-8: slar yang shes rab dang bcas pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs su sems par byed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1277E:127b-9: zhal zas dbul ba la sogs pa sngon bzhin te /
T02TD1277E:127b-10: thog mar gtor ma sbyang ste /
T02TD1277E:127b-11: aom tree lo kya a'a kshe pa yi mam ba lim grihna grihna aa mu ka sya raksham sh'intam raksh'a nytsa ku ru h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:127b-12: zhes pa'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas dbul le //
T02TD1277E:127b-13: aom dzva la badzra la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so la bod pa'i dam tshig byin nas rang rang gi sngags kyis zhal zas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:127b-14: aom a'a nee ra a'a tmya zhes pa la sogs pas bod par byas la /
T02TD1277E:127b-15: de'i sa bon yang bklags te /
T02TD1277E:127b-16: aa mu ka sya sh'intam raksh'a nytsa ku ru h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:127b-17: aom h'um zhes pa 'dis bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T02TD1277E:127b-19: na mo badzra mung ga ra ha st'a ya tsanda mandala a'a kshe pa ka r'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:127b-21: ma h'a danda dha ra bi bi dha su ra aa su ra /
T02TD1277E:127b-22: mardha na bh'u t'a nni rma th'a h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:127b-24: na mo badzra kro dh'a ya ma h'a dam shtro tka ra bhee ra ba ya /
T02TD1277E:127b-26: aom aa mri ta kunda li raksham ma ma ku ru h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:127b-27: na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo //
T02TD1277E:127b-28: na mo aa tsa la k'a n'm /
T02TD1277E:127b-33: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:127b-34: na ma: sa ma nta bu ddhe bhyo /
T02TD1277E:128a-1: h'um dza: na ma: samanta buddhe bhyo /
T02TD1277E:128a-6: sarbba du sht'am m'a ra ya m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:128a-7: na ma: sa manta buddhe bhyo /
T02TD1277E:128a-8: na mo ma h'a ba l'a ya au tstshusham kro dha r'a dz'a ya /
T02TD1277E:128a-13: na ma: samanta dha rm'a n'am /
T02TD1277E:128a-14: na ma: samanta sam gh'a n'am /
T02TD1277E:128a-15: aom si ta ta pa tra /
T02TD1277E:128a-19: aom badzra au shn'i sha tsa kra brti /
T02TD1277E:128a-23: t'a da n'am k'i la nam b'a /
T02TD1277E:128a-25: ye na ke na tsi tat kri tam ta /
T02TD1277E:128a-32: h'um 'hum h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1277E:128a-35: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02TD1277E:128a-36: a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na b'idya r'a dza h'um phat /
T02TD1277E:128a-37: ces pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur du gsungs pa'i sngags bcus shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams dang dbang ldan la sogs pa rnams su yang g-yas skor gyis dang /
T02TD1277E:128a-38: steng dang 'og tu yang gshin rje'i rje bo la sogs pa'i khro bo bcu po rnams la'o //
T02TD1277E:128a-39: aom ainda dza ma dza la /
T02TD1277E:128a-40: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang po la sogs pa rnams la yang sngon bzhin sbyin par byas te /
T02TD1277E:128a-41: de rnams kyis kyang sngon bzhin bdud rtsi myangs pas mchog gi bde ba chen po thob par gyur nas sgrub pa po'i mngon par 'dod pa sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bsams te /
T02TD1277E:128a-42: smon lam la sogs pa byas nas sngon bzhin gshegs su gsol zhes pa'o //
T02TD1277E:128a-43: 'di yang bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gtor ma'i chog gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1277E:128a-44: bskyed pa'i rim par ni shes rab dang thabs rjes su g-yos pa'i khu bas zas tsam gyi ro myang bas /
T02TD1277E:128a-45: shes rab dang thabs kyi ngo bo rnams la dang /
T02TD1277E:128a-46: de bzhin du rang ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po la sogs pa'i lta dang phan pa dang bcas pa'i dbang po la sogs pa rnams la ye shes kyi ro dang dbyer med pa'i gtor mas nye bar mchod pa ni gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1277E:128a-47: cho ga ji lta bar sbyang bar byas pa'i bgrang phreng tshad ldan rnams kyis sngags bzlas pas myur bar dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes pas /
T02TD1277E:128a-48: de'i cho gcung zad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:128b-0: mig ni lha la lhag par mos pa'i @128b tshul rang bzhin gyis shes pa'o //
T02TD1277E:128b-1: de gsal bar byed pa'i phyir srad bu'i ming can te /
T02TD1277E:128b-3: yi ge rnams kyi srad ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-4: grangs su byed pa'i phyir akasha su tra ste /
T02TD1277E:128b-6: ai las brjod pa ma yin pa'i zhes pas re pha dbye'o //
T02TD1277E:128b-7: de la mu tig dang shel dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-8: rus pa la sogs pa rnams la zlum po mdzes par byas pa'i ril bu rnams kyis zhi ba dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-9: dngul la sogs pa rnams kyis rgyas pa dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-11: byu ru la sogs pa rnams kyis dbang dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-13: lung tang dang ma he'i rus pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mngon spyod kyi las dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-14: bu'i bon gyi las thams cad par kha sbyor thig ler gsungs shing brtag pa gnyis par ni /
T02TD1277E:128b-15: shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid //
T02TD1277E:128b-16: ni ram shus ni sdang ba la //
T02TD1277E:128b-17: rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid //
T02TD1277E:128b-18: bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa la //
T02TD1277E:128b-19: glang po'i rus pas char 'bab pa //
T02TD1277E:128b-21: ril bu brgya rnams kyis zhi ba dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-22: brgyad lhag pas rgyas pa dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-23: nyi shu rtsa lngas dbang du byas ba dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-24: drug cus mngon spyod la dang rgyas las thams cad la'o //
T02TD1277E:128b-25: 'jam dpal gyi rgyud du gsungs pa //
T02TD1277E:128b-26: brgya dang brgyad dam nyi shu lnga //
T02TD1277E:128b-27: lnga bcu de bzhin bar ma'o //
T02TD1277E:128b-28: de yi tshad kyi phreng rnams ni //
T02TD1277E:128b-29: kun phan sngags pas thag par brgyu //
T02TD1277E:128b-30: stong phrag brgyad kyang de bzhin bya //
T02TD1277E:128b-31: phreng ba rnams ni mthe bong tsam //
T02TD1277E:128b-32: de ltar phreng pa rnam pa bzhi //
T02TD1277E:128b-33: 'dir ni sngags pas brgyu bar bya //
T02TD1277E:128b-35: de la gzhon nu mas byas pa'i srad bu rnams padma'i phyag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rnam par dag pa phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su brgyad dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-36: dbus su kun nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par dag pas gcig go zhes te /
T02TD1277E:128b-37: dgu'i yon tan gyi srad bu bsgril bar byas nas /
T02TD1277E:128b-38: rim pas ril bu thag pa la brgyus te /
T02TD1277E:128b-39: srad bu'i gdong gnyis mdud pa byas pa'i steng du ril bu ste /
T02TD1277E:128b-40: kun du bsten pa'i stobs dang /
T02TD1277E:128b-41: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang po'i chos kyi sku nyid do //
T02TD1277E:129a-0: de'i steng du ril bu gzhan ni chos kyi dbyings de bzhin @129a * //
T02TD1277E:129a-2: de nas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog gi ril bu tsan da na la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
T02TD1277E:129a-3: kye rdo rje la sogs pa'i sngags bzla bas ni bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga yis sbyangs te /
T02TD1277E:129a-4: myur bar lag pa g-yas kyi sor mo rnams rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i ngo bor bsgoms nas /
T02TD1277E:129a-5: aa yig las skyes pa'i nyi mas de byin gyi brlab po //
T02TD1277E:129a-6: g-yon pa'i sor mo padma'i 'dab ma'i rnam par gsal ba la /
T02TD1277E:129a-7: dang po'i dbyangs yongs su gyur pa la ri dgas mtshan pa ste /
T02TD1277E:129a-10: thabs kyi rang bzhin de ngag gi dbus su /
T02TD1277E:129a-12: kye rdo rje'i gzugs kyi bar ma chad par mngon par 'dod pa'i lha'i ngo bor ram /
T02TD1277E:129a-13: thams cad ril bur bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1277E:129a-14: aksha ru k'a ra nya tu aa so hi aa manta bi sa ru ga ni aa sam kha aa li si dzdza ai ta tu bi sa ru aom pa de pa de ma h'a dzny'a na sarba buddha ma grihnadha ma handha bi te h'um h'um h'um hom hom hom a'a sv'a h'a /
T02TD1277E:129a-15: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1277E:129a-16: brgyad lhag pa'i brgyar bsgyur pa'i sngags bzlas pas kyang byin gyis brlab bo zhes pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1277E:129a-17: de'i rjes su sdong pa nyid dang snying rje dag dbyer med par lhag par mos pas /
T02TD1277E:129a-18: g-yas pa'i lag pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi las rnams la /
T02TD1277E:129a-19: grangs ji lta bar sdigs mdzub dang /
T02TD1277E:129a-22: mthe'u chung rnams su grung phreng gi phreng ba gzhag pa yang /
T02TD1277E:129a-23: ma the bong gi rtse mo rdo rdze lcags kyu'i ngo bor bsgoms te /
T02TD1277E:129a-24: lha dgug pa'i bsam pa dang bar byas nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:129a-26: dam tshig dag ni bsten pa dang //
T02TD1277E:129a-27: rnal 'byor sgom par byed pa dang //
T02TD1277E:129a-28: sngags bzlas pa la sogs pa yis //
T02TD1277E:129a-31: dam tshig 'ga' zhig brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1277E:129a-32: sems can rnams la snying brtse ba dor bar mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129a-33: gzhan la tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa med par gleng bar mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129a-34: mngon spyod kyi las mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-0: 'jigs pa dang zhum pa dang khro ba la @129b so pa yongs su spang ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-1: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i don du bdag gi yon tan bsgrags par mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-2: phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang sngags rnams rang gi rtog pa tsam gyis mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-3: bde bar bshegs pas gsungs pa'i sna tshogs pa'i sngags dang lha rnams kyang dbye ba med par gzung bar bya zhing /
T02TD1277E:129b-5: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams las slar chos dang cho ga thob par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-7: bza' bya ma yin pa la sogs pa rnams rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par mos par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-8: 'jig rten la gnod pa rnams rjes su bsrung ba la 'jug par goms par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-9: bya ba ngan par spyod pa rnams drangs te /
T02TD1277E:129b-10: bdag gi nang gi nang du thob par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-11: sgom pa po bdag rnal 'byor ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-12: rnal 'byor ma'i bdag nyid du the chom za ba de rnams kyi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i don spong ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-13: brda rnams la bdag goms par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-14: ji ltar tshogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dag pas bsten par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-15: bud med rnams gdung bar mi bya zhing khyad par du phyag rgya'o gzungs ma la tshig ngan mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-17: bza' ba rnams la 'gom par mi bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-18: chom rkun gyi grogs spang par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-19: bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma lnga nag po'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ril bur byas nas grib ma la bskams te /
T02TD1277E:129b-20: thod pa'i snod kha spyor du gzhag cing ji lta bar bdud rtsir byas nas nyi ma so sor bsten par bya ba dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-21: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang /
T02TD1277E:129b-22: sbom po'i ltung ba brgyad rnams 'bad pas spang bar bya ste /
T02TD1277E:129b-23: de rnams ni rab tu grags pa nyid yin pas ma bris so //
T02TD1277E:129b-24: de rnams dang gzhan yang dam tshig gi khyad par rmad du byung ba rnam pa mang po de dang de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud rnams su gsungs pa rnams grub pa rnams kyis kyang rab tu spros so //
T02TD1277E:129b-25: de ltar rtogs par byas nas 'gom par mi byas zhing /
T02TD1277E:129b-26: dam tshig smra bar yang mi bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02TD1277E:129b-27: brtag pa gnyis pa la sogs rgyud rnams su /
T02TD1277E:130a-1: thabs ni rnam pa du ma zhig / mthong nas rnam pa sna tshogs mngon rtogs dang /
T02TD1277E:130a-2: sgrub pa'i thabs rnams gzhan yang 'bad par byas /
T02TD1277E:130a-3: srog dang 'dra ba'i bla med bla ma dang //
T02TD1277E:130a-4: don du gnyer ba'i slob ma rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD1277E:130a-5: cung zad dag ni bskul bar gyur pa la //
T02TD1277E:130a-6: 'di ni bdag gis rab tu bkod pa yin //
T02TD1277E:130a-7: rang nyid gzugs brnyan 'dra yang bskul ba las //
T02TD1277E:130a-8: thub pa'i dgongs pa cung zad 'chad pa gang //
T02TD1277E:130a-9: de ni ngan pa'i spyod pa nyid yin te //
T02TD1277E:130a-10: ltung ba dang bcas dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur //
T02TD1277E:130a-11: mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le 'di byas la //
T02TD1277E:130a-12: bdag gis dge ba nye bar bsgrubs pa gang //
T02TD1277E:130a-13: de yis myur du dpal ldan kye rdo rje'i //
T02TD1277E:130a-14: rnal 'byor snod du bdag dang 'jig rten gyur //
T02TD1277E:130a-15: rnam par grags pa'i mkhas pa gnas brtan sh'akya srung ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i /
T02TD1277E:130a-16: dpal kye rdo rje'i mngon par rtogs pa'i thig le 'di rdzogs so /
T02TD1277E:130a-18: // / lung rigs kyi dbang phyug skad gnyis smra pa'i gtsug gi nor bu //
T02TD1277E:130a-19: dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i bka' drin las //
T02TD1277E:130a-20: brda spyod pa'i tshul la blo'i snang ba cung zad thob pa sh'akya'i btsun pa skyob pa dpal bzang po zhes bya bas bsgyur ba'o //
T02TD1277E:130a-21: rgyud rgyal rin chen 'byung gnas bsrubs pa las /
T02TD1277E:130a-22: 'byung ba'i nor bu rim gnyis 'od dkar can //
T02TD1277E:130a-23: gang 'dis bod yul gdul bya'o ku mud tshal //
T02TD1277E:130a-24: rgyas par bya phyir skyob pa dpal bzang pos //
T02TD1277E:130a-25: bsgyur las byung ba'i dge ba rab dkar ba //
T02TD1277E:130a-26: de yis 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /
T02TD1277E:130a-27: pandi ta la ma gtugs pa dang /
T02TD1277E:130a-28: rgya dpe gnyis pa'ang ma rnyed pas nongs pa'i cha mchis pa rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzad nas slar bcos shing nyes pa'i cha rnams 'dor bar bya'o//
